This constructor sets the properties for the enemy, including its size, background color, and tag. It also loads the enemy image and initializes movement and shooting timers. The enemy is initially allowed to shoot. public Enemy() Fields enemyImagePath public static string enemyImagePath Field Value string Methods Hit() Handles actions taken when the enemy is hit and removed. public void Hit() Shoot() /// Initiates the shooting action for the enemy character. The method checks if the enemy can shoot, creates a missile, and manages its movement. It handles missile collision detection with the player's ship and obstacles, reducing health accordingly. If the missile goes off-screen or hits an obstacle, it is removed from the game and disposed of. public void Shoot()

This constructor sets up the game environment, including graphics settings, sound playback, keyboard input handling, timers for movement and missile firing, and initializes game elements such as enemies and the score. public Mars() Fields ShipHp public static int ShipHp Field Value int obstacle1HP public static int obstacle1HP Field Value int obstacle2HP public static int obstacle2HP Field Value int obstacle3HP public static int obstacle3HP Field Value int shipSpeed public int shipSpeed Field Value int Properties Score public static int Score { get; set; } Property Value int Methods CreateExplosion(Point, string) Creates an explosion effect at a specified position. This method initializes a PictureBox for the explosion, loads the explosion image, and adds it to the form. It also sets up a delay to remove the explosion after a short duration. public void CreateExplosion(Point position, string boomPath) Parameters position Point The position where the explosion should occur. boomPath string The file path to the explosion image. CreateExplosionObstacle(PictureBox, string) Creates an explosion effect at specified positions when an obstacle is destroyed. The explosion positions are predefined for each obstacle, and this method checks the health points (HP) of the obstacles to determine when to create an explosion. public static void CreateExplosionObstacle(PictureBox pictureBoxShip, string boomPath) Parameters pictureBoxShip PictureBox The PictureBox representing the player's ship. boomPath string The file path to the explosion image. Dispose(bool) Clean up any resources being used. protected override void Dispose(bool disposing) Parameters disposing bool true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false. FireMissile() Fires a missile from the spaceship's position. protected void FireMissile() RemovePictureBox(PictureBox) Removes a specified PictureBox control from the form, disposing of its resources. public void RemovePictureBox(PictureBox pb) Parameters pb PictureBox The PictureBox control to remove. SpaceshipTimer_Tick(object, EventArgs) Handles the timer tick event for spaceship movement. Moves the spaceship left or right based on player input while ensuring it stays within the form's boundaries. protected void SpaceshipTimer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e) Parameters sender object The source of the event. e EventArgs The event data.
